VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: Sleep Mode 2.0
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: This gene replaces the standard hard drive memory limitation with a sleep mode system.\n\nInstead of requiring periodic reformatting when memory is full, androids with this hardware experience a sleep need similar to biological pawns, allowing them to rest and refresh their internal memory. However, this makes them more susceptible to collapsing due to memory overflow if left unchecked.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: silhouette perception
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: This neural processing module limits facial recognition, reducing biological entities to basic silhouettes with featureless appearances.\n\nOriginally implemented by JCJenson as a security measure to prevent worker drones from distinguishing between humans or forming attachments. This deliberate limitation maintains operational compliance while preventing social bonds that could compromise corporate control.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Robotic and Android pawns are not affected.
